metadata.title: CVE-2020-35524 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A heap-based buffer overflow flaw was found in libtiff in the handling ofTIFF images in libtiff's TIFF2PDF tool. A specially crafted TIFF file canlead to arbitrary code execution. The highest threat from thisvulnerability is to confidentiality, integrity, as well as systemavailability.

criterions.comment: tiff: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
